text:
@WHO @WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @pahowho @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO About 2019nCOV:
1.For now everything under control.
2.We believe our country government.
3.We believe we can win this virus war.
4.17 years ago we beat SARS, we trust this time we also:can win.Thanks for your support , thanks for praying for china.Thanks for whising us good luck.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
